Package com.apriori.reflect.model

Extensions of elements and type mirrors for use with core reflection.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Elements
    An extension of the standard Elements interface that provides methods for inter-op with core reflection.
    Types
    An extension of the standard Types interface that provides methods for inter-op with core reflection.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnnotationMirrors
    Utility methods for constructing instances of AnnotationMirror and AnnotationValue.

Package com.apriori.reflect.model Description

Extensions of elements and type mirrors for use with core reflection.

The interfaces herein define new factory methods for adapting reflection APIs and class tokens to the element and type mirror models. These can be useful in annotation processors.

But also herein is an implementation of element and type mirror models that are backed by core reflection. This allows type-crawling / reflective code to be written once and then used from either context:

  • From an annotation processor, using the models provided by the processing environment.
  • From the runtime of a standard java application, using models backed by core reflection.

This package should be a suitable implementation for JEP 119 except that it does not expose extra reflective operations, such as instantiating objects, invoking methods, or querying/updating field values.
